hymn.title: God Will Sovereignly Use

lyrics.stanza: God will sovereignly Use persons, things and events to empty us Of everything that has filled us And to take away every preoccupation
So that we may have An increased capacity To be filled with God, To be filled with God.
So that we may have An increased capacity To be filled with God, To be filled with God.
